title: How to Make a Homemade Nerf Sniper Scope

steps.title: Remove the lens from a magnifying glass.
steps.content: Remove the lens from a magnifying glass. An optional choice would be to take a ruler and a Sharpie to make crosshairs

steps.title: Cut a little slot into a toilet paper tube or PVC pipe.
steps.content: Cut a little slot into a toilet paper tube or PVC pipe.

steps.title: Duct tape the scope onto the gun.
